    • addProduct

      public boolean addProduct​(Product product)
      Adds given product to ShoppingCart-List items.
      Parameters:
      product - Product which shall be added to this Shoppingcart
      Returns:
      True if successful, false if watch not found or invalid.

    • deleteProduct

      public boolean deleteProduct​(Product product)
      Removes given product from ShoppingCart-List items.
      Parameters:
      product - Product which shall be removed
      Returns:
      true if successful, false if watch not found.
